author: remm
msg: - Exclude the binaries from the fixCRLF.

author: remm
msg: - New attempt to fix the CRLF problems.
- Add webapp auto deploy. For example, a WAR dropped in the appBase
directory of a host will be automatically deployed.
- Add web.xml tracking. If web.xml is modified, the context will be stopped and
then restarted. That only happens with reloadable contexts.
- All is done by a background thread very similar to the background thread the
class reloading uses. There is one thread associated with each host. At the
moment, the thread will always be created, but this could be made optional by
adding a new flag to the host (like autoDeploy).

author: remm
msg: - getResource and getResourceAsStream weren't calling the superclass
(which is needed when there are external repositories).
- Will attempt to load a class even if it already failed before.

author: remm
msg: - Add an optimization to avoid calling the superclass if there are no external
- getResource and getResourceAsStream weren't calling the superclass
(which is needed when there are external repositories).
